query:
SELECT
                COUNT(*) as "reading_count!",
                SUM(value) as total_consumption,
                AVG(value) as average_daily,
                MIN(value) as min_value,
                MAX(value) as max_value,
                unit,
                source
            FROM iot_readings
            WHERE building_id = $1
              AND metric_type::TEXT = $2
              AND timestamp >= $3
              AND timestamp <= $4
            GROUP BY unit, source
